content.rendered:
The Pele side chair comprises a chrome coated steel frame with a wooden seat and back. The legs are tapered and are welded together under the seat to create a solid frame for the seat. The Seat is available in a choice of colours, please specify colour at time of ordering .

A bar stool to match the chairs is also available in Wenge or Natural finish.

Held in stock for delivery in 3-5 working days. 1 Year Guarantee. Requires basic self assembly.

Stackable 4 high.
